## Change
<!--- What kind of change does your code introduce? Put an `x` in all the boxes that apply: -->

- [ ] Bug fix (a change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (a change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Chore (a change which does not add functionality but improves code quality)
- [ ] Docs (a non-functional change that only affects documentation)

## Tasks

- [ ] My code has been linted and run through prettier.
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly.
